forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun this morning with increasing clouds this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 59F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High around 60F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. SSE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 46F. SSE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning with bright sunshine in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, then sunny in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low near 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 41F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
